content: this highly detailed and illustrated crochet pattern will take through every step to make this stunning boho top - the luna crop this pattern is for the following sizes - xs s m l & xl with fully customizable bust cups from size a to e this top ties up at the neck and the back for a perfect fit every time pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology this listing is for an instant pdf download for the crochet luna crop pattern is made using 10 ply/worsted/number 4 cotton yarn 100-150g and requires a 5mm hook skill level easy- advanced beginner to work this pattern you need to know how to - work flat row single_crochet double_crochet stitches chain stitches and basic stitch combinations this listing is not a finished product you will not receive a finished top if you buy this listing there will be no refund for purchases made in error unless the item has not yet been downloaded all of our patterns include many pictures gauge abbreviation keys stitch counts and extra notes to help explain if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to contact us -----------instant download link will be emailed to you once payment has cleared--------------- this listing is for the pattern only not the finished item the pattern and photographs contained in this document are property of peach&paige this pattern is available for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is allowed products made from this pattern may be sold
